content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. I'm glad you like the apartment. As a landlord, I'm always looking to get the best price for my properties. So, let's get down to business. What do you think the rent for this apartment should be?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I think the rent for this apartment should be 450 Euros. This is a fair price because the apartment is newly built and in the city center. Also, it is close to all important facilities.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I see. Well, I must say, you're a tough negotiator, Maryam. I was thinking more along the lines of 550 Euros per month. After all, this is a luxury apartment in a prime location. But I'm willing to listen to your offer and see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

So, tell me, what makes you think 450 Euros is a fair price? And are you willing to make any concessions to sweeten the deal?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 450 Euros is a fair price because the apartment is unfurnished. Also, I am a student and I can only pay this price. I am willing to pay 480 Euros because this is the maximum I can afford. I am a smart and dependable person, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
I understand your perspective, Maryam. However, as a landlord, I have expenses to cover, such as maintenance and property taxes. I also want to ensure that my tenants are comfortable and happy in their living space.

I'm willing to consider your offer of 480 Euros, but I'm afraid I can't go any lower than that. I believe it's a fair price for both of us, considering the location and the quality of the apartment.

However, I want to make sure that we have a good relationship as landlord and tenant. So, I'm willing to throw in a few extras to sweeten the deal. How about I provide you with a fully equipped kitchen, including appliances and utensils? That way, you won't have to worry about purchasing those items yourself.

Additionally, I'll include a free monthly cleaning service for the apartment. That way, you can focus on your studies and not have to worry about cleaning the apartment.

What do you think? Is that a fair offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your generous offer. I agree to the price of 480 Euros. The fully equipped kitchen and free monthly cleaning service are a great benefit for me. I appreciate your cooperation and understanding. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
